title: Steamed orange and banana sponge
ingredients: ['Vegetable oil for greasing', '1 teaspoon golden syrup', '2 oranges', '75 g (2¾ oz) fresh white breadcrumbs', '150 g (5½ oz) self-raising white flour', '25 g (1 oz) light vegetable suet', '75 g (2¾ oz) golden caster sugar', '1 banana', '100 ml (3½ fl oz) skimmed milk', 'To serve: low-fat custard (see footnote for Rhubarb, Orange, and Ginger Crumble on this website)']
